column2: The  prosecution is  not spared  either  when it found  wanting with
divisional  bench  of  this  Court,  in  Wickramasinghe  v  Attorney  General
(2010)  1 Sri L.R.  141,  had imposed a  duty on the prosecution to conclude

column1: criminal prosecutions during a  specified time line, in view of Sections 16

column2: and 17 of the Bail Act, as it was held;
